thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 22 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Urban Outfitters Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.38

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Urban Outfitters Reports Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.38
text:
May 22 (Reuters) - Urban Outfitters Inc:
* QUARTERLY SALES ROSE 12.4 PERCENT TO $856 MILLION * AS OF APRIL 30, 2018, TOTAL INVENTORY INCREASED BY $45.1 MILLION, OR 12.6 PERCENT, ON A YEAR-OVER-YEAR BASIS
* QTRLY COMPARABLE RETAIL SEGMENT NET SALES INCREASED 10% * COMPARABLE RETAIL SEGMENT INVENTORY AT QUARTER-END INCREASED 8 PERCENT AT COST
* URBAN OUTFITTERS - BY BRAND, COMPARABLE RETAIL SEGMENT NET SALES UP 15% AT FREE PEOPLE, 10% AT ANTHROPOLOGIE GROUP AND 8% AT URBAN OUTFITTERS IN QUARTER
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31, REVENUE VIEW $838.1 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
